name: Crater Land
description:
[Features]

  • 2D Platformer
  • More than 20 Levels spanning 5 unique worlds
  • Dozens of friendly NPCs
  • Unique abilities such as ground pound and wall jump
  • Hundreds of coins
  • Use gamepad or keyboard

[Controls]

  • Move: Arrow Keys on Keyboard / Analog Stick on Gamepad
  • Jump: X on Keyboard / A on Gamepad
  • Dash: Z on Keyboard / B on Gamepad
  • Wall Slide: Move against wall, while falling
  • Wall Jump: Jump against wall
  • Carry: Hold Up while close to an item
  • Throw: Dash while carrying an item
  • Drop: Press down while carrying an item
  • Crouch: Hold Down while walking
  • Ground Pound: Hold Down while falling
  • Climb: Jump on Ladder + Hold Up
  • Enter Door: Unlock Door + Hold Up
  • Pause: Esc on Keyboard / Start on Gamepad
